name: Frog Guy Go Home
description:
FROG GUY GO HOME Overview  

Hopper has been trapped by a mean bully. You must escape his grasp and return to your family. Many dangers await your journey. 

Available to you are unique skills to venture this challenging journey home.

Jump to get on top of unreachable platforms. Use your tongue to reach even further places or pull useful items towards you. 

 

GOALS
  • Fun gameplay
  • Interesting locations 
  • Frog Simulator
  • Level storytelling

HOOK

You are a frog trapped by a bully and must get home. 

3 Cs Character 

Hopper. 

Tiny tree frog with a cartoonish style. It will play very similar to Crash Bandicoot or any third-person platformer or adventure game.

Camera

Third Person Camera, You can rotate the camera around the character but it will always be in focus.

Controls
  • Moving around - WASD 
  • Jumping – Space bar 
  • Right Click to Pull/Grab
  • Left Click to Push
TEAM MEMBERS

Arun - Programmer, Game Designer, Sound Design

Chrispaul - 3D Art

Pari -  3D Art, Character Design, Animator 

Victor Diaz    - Project Manager, Programmer, Level Designer
